headline: Jim Cramer says investors should avoid buying stocks near their highs after the market's recent rally
summary: Jim Cramer warns investors not to chase stocks after big rallies, pointing to better entry points created by volatility and earnings season pullbacks.

headline: Why Applied Materials (AMAT) Is Up 13.9% After Renewed AI-Focused Factory Spending Expectations And What's Next
summary: In early January 2026, Applied Materials drew fresh attention as investors focused on how AI-driven demand for advanced logic, memory, and packaging tools could influence long-term factory spending and orders ahead of the company’s February 12 earnings update. A key insight is that, despite ongoing U.S. export restrictions affecting China-related sales, institutional interest and options activity suggest the market is closely watching Applied Materials as a core supplier to AI and...
